snippet.title: Phantom Gear Genesis Trailer - Mega Cat Studios Video Game
snippet.description:
Gear up in your battle armor and take on the sinister Ocular Force! Become Josephine and put a stop to the power-mad cult and the mysterious phantom force behind their spree of carnage!

Features:
   -Purchase Permanent Upgrades
   -Multiple Weapons
   -Platforming Skill Progression
   -Massive Boss Fights
   -Animated Cutscenes

Stay up to date on Phantom Gear and other releases from Mega Cat Studios at: https://www.megacatstudios.com

Come join in on the discussion at our official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/megacat

Phantom Gear is not licensed, sponsored, published, or endorsed by SEGA Enterprises Ltd, SEGA Corporation, SEGA Holdings Co, or their affiliates.

Mega Cat Studios is an independent games development studio. This title is an unofficial and unlicensed release for the SEGA Mega Drive console, and is not affiliated with SEGA Enterprises Ltd, SEGA Corporation, or SEGA Holdings Co.

SEGA® and MEGA DRIVE®  are trademarks of SEGA Holdings Co.
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/

Come play & talk on discord! www.discord.gg/megacat
